page.title: 02Employment
page.content: Employment in North Queensferry is in the local shops,rail station,school and boat repair yard.Most people will commute.Employment in South Queensferry includes local shops,pubs,bank,building societies and schools.Other employers:Trafalgar House,120 employees,contract,engineeri ng,draughting. Garage,A.G.Mc Gill,1 employee,car repairs Sandy Brown associates,10 employees,architects,acousticians. Ashdown Design Mr Loam,40 employees, printed circuit boards for electronics industry:Taunton Cider,12 employees,Cider. Vat 69,bottling plant,340 employees,Whisky,closed March 1985. Lochinvar Aluminium Windows:10 employees,double glazing. Hound point:BP,12 employees,loading crude oil.
